summary: Allows the weapon specialization perks to apply to any weapon from it's category.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]!!Currently outdated. Might interfere with patches!![/color]

Daggers, Swords, War Axes and Maces will now get benefits from Bone Breaker, Baldesman and Hack and Slash.

Greatswords, Battle Axes and Warhammers will now get benefits from Skullcrusher, Limbsplitter and Deep Wounds.

*This will not recieve further updates appart from fixes.

This was done as a request but made available to everyone.
author: ErikRedbeard
